overview: Wolfgang Krause joined Seventure Partners in 2008 in charge of pursuing ICT german investment opportunities. For the last 10 years Wolfgang worked in the ICT industry as an early stage investor as well as in business development and sales. Wolfgang was a partner at Altos Advisors (Munich), at Deutsche Venture Capital, (Munich) and Telesoft Partners a $500+ million Silicon Valley based venture capital firm. He was a board director of Apertio (sold to Nokia Siemens Networks), Sigma-C (sold to Synopsis) and LASOR AG (sold to ISRA AG). Wolfgang started his career at Mannesmann Telecommunications where he held various operational positions in Germany (Mannesmann Eurokom) and France (Cegetel/SFR). Wolfgang holds a MBA and PhD from the University of Munich.
